  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(float delta)
      Description copied from class: AnimatedBoxGameObject
      Prepares the collision box for further changes and updates the object animation based on delta.
      Overrides:
      update in class AnimatedBoxGameObject
      Parameters:
      delta - Provided by mini2Dx. The time span between the current frame and the last frame in seconds. Might be smoothed over n frames.

    • moveVert

      protected boolean moveVert​(AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions yDirection)
      Description copied from class: AnimatedBoxGameObject
      Moves the object in the given y-direction if the move is legal as defined by moveInBounds.
      Overrides:
      moveVert in class AnimatedBoxGameObject
      Parameters:
      yDirection - The y-direction the object should move in.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the the move was successful.

    • fireProjectile

      public boolean fireProjectile​(java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> projectiles, float speed)
      Overrides:
      fireProjectile in class AnimatedBoxGameObject
      Parameters:
      projectiles - Projectile container to which the new projectile will be added.
      speed - The amount of pixels the projectile moves with each call of the move method.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the projectile was successfully added to the projectiles container.
